inclusion.criterion: elective hospital admission for one night
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA) physical status classification 1, 2 of 3.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: previous injury or surgery of the involved shoulder
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: pre-existing neuropathy or myopathy of the involved arm
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: allergy or contra-indication for the medication used in the study
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 14-year-old boy complaining of scoliosis and back pain. He has no other medical condition.
